pullrequest.title: Allow world with a name other than "default". Fixed all tests.

content.raw: The problem seems to be sensitive to the amount of sleep time in ConnectionManager.cc:265. I increased the sleep time from 1 ms back to 30 ms, and I was able to make it farther into the factory_stress test. Likewise, if I reduce the sleep to 10 us, it hangs much more quickly.
content.html: The problem seems to be sensitive to the amount of sleep time in ConnectionManager.cc:265. I increased the sleep time from 1 ms back to 30 ms, and I was able to make it farther into the factory_stress test. Likewise, if I reduce the sleep to 10 us, it hangs much more quickly.
